TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionIDManager extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDManager

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態的唯一識別項。

span.span: Manages unique identifiers for ASP.NET session state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是 HTTP 模組，管理 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態使用的唯一工作階段識別碼。The class is an HTTP module that manages unique session identifiers for use with ASP.NET session state. ASP.NET 工作階段的唯一識別項是屬性，您可以從存取屬性的目前或。The unique identifier for an ASP.NET session is the property, which can be accessed from the property of the current or . ASP.NET 工作階段識別碼是隨機產生的數字，編碼為 24 個字元字串，其中包含從小寫字元 z 和數字 0 到 5。The ASP.NET session identifier is a randomly generated number encoded into a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5. 根據預設，值會傳送與 ASP.NET 應用程式的每個要求的 cookie 中。By default, the value is sent in a cookie with each request to the ASP.NET application. 包含 cookie 名稱值預設為 ASP.NET_SessionId。The name of the cookie that contains the value is ASP.NET_SessionId by default. 您可以設定不同的 cookie 名稱，藉由設定`cookieName`的屬性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)所需的 cookie 名稱。You can configure a different cookie name by setting the `cookieName` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) to the desired cookie name. 如果您想要停用使用 ASP.NET 應用程式中的 cookie，並仍能使用的工作階段狀態，您可以設定您的應用程式的 URL，而非 cookie 中儲存的工作階段識別碼，藉由設定`cookieless`屬性的`sessionState`項目`true`在您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。If you want to disable the use of cookies in your ASP.NET application and still make use of session state, you can configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL instead of a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute of the `sessionState` element to `true` in the Web.config file for your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information, see the property.

para.span: 您可以使用您自己的自訂工作階段識別碼取代 ASP.NET 工作階段識別項，藉由建立繼承的類別類別並覆寫和以您自己的自訂實作的方法。

span.span: You can replace the ASP.NET session identifier with your own custom session identifier by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementations.

para.span: 如需範例，會覆寫類別，並實作這些方法，請參閱針對提供的範例方法。

span.span: For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method.

para.span: 您可以取代整個與藉由建立類別來實作自訂的工作階段識別碼管理員介面。

span.span: You can replace the entire with a custom session-ID manager by creating a class that implements the interface.

para.span: 如果您的自訂工作階段識別碼管理員支援無 cookie 工作階段識別碼，您必須實作解決方案來傳送和擷取的 URL，例如 ISAPI 篩選器中的工作階段識別碼。

span.span: If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter.

para.span: 如需建立自訂的工作階段 ID 管理員的詳細資訊，請參閱。

span.span: For more information about creating a custom session-ID manager, see .

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

related.span: HTTP 處理常式和 HTTP 模組概觀

span.span: HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview

ASP.NET 會呼叫這個建構函式建立的執行個體類別。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 之後呼叫建構函式，ASP.NET 會呼叫方法來初始化新物件。After calling the constructor, ASP.NET calls the method to initialize the new object.

summary.span: 建立工作階段的唯一工作階段識別項。

span.span: Creates a unique session identifier for the session.
A unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法會傳回隨機產生的數字，編碼為 24 個字元字串，其中包含從小寫字元的唯一工作階段識別碼至 z 和數字 0 到 5。The method returns a unique session identifier that is a randomly generated number encoded into a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繼承的類別類別並覆寫並方法，提供並驗證方法做為。The following code example shows a class that inherits the class and overrides the and methods with methods that supply and validate a as the . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/GuidSessionIDModule.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/GuidSessionIDModule.vb#7)] 若要使用此範例所示的自訂類別，設定 sessionIDManagerType 屬性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)項目，如下列範例所示。To use the custom class demonstrated in this example, configure the sessionIDManagerType attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

para.span: 您可以提供自訂的工作階段識別碼使用的 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態，藉由建立繼承的類別類別並覆寫和以您自己的自訂實作的方法。

span.span: You can supply a custom session identifier to be used by ASP.NET session state by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementations.

para.span: 如果您的自訂工作階段識別碼不符合強制執行的預設實作的字元條件約束方法時，您應該覆寫方法，以提供驗證您的自訂工作階段識別碼。

span.span: If your custom session ID does not meet the character constraints enforced by the default implementation of the method, you should override the method to provide validation of your custom session identifier.

para.span: 在此情況下，類別，可確保您的自訂工作階段識別項 URL 為 HTTP 回應中編碼和解碼從 HTTP 要求使用的 URL和方法，分別。

span.span: In this case, the class will ensure that your custom session identifier is URL encoded in the HTTP response and URL decoded from the HTTP request using the and methods, respectively.

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

span.span: to indicate the object has done a redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`cookieless`的屬性`sessionState`元素設定為`AutoDetect`，則物件將會重新導向至相同的路徑，以判斷連線的瀏覽器是否支援 cookie。When the `cookieless` attribute of the `sessionState` element is set to `AutoDetect`, the object will redirect to the same path to determine whether the connecting browser supports cookies. 如果`suppressAutoDetectRedirect`參數是`false`，伺服器將不會執行此重新導向。If the `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` parameter is `false`, the server will not perform this redirection. `supportSessionIDReissue`參數將會傳回`false`如果要求用於工作階段識別的 cookie。The `supportSessionIDReissue` parameter will be returned `false` if the request is using cookies for session identification.

summary.span: 將新建立的工作階段識別項儲存至 HTTP 回應。

span.span: Saves a newly created session identifier to the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法會呼叫物件期間事件。The method is called by the object during the event. 方法會將工作階段識別碼儲存在任一個 URL （使用無 cookie 工作階段狀態） 時，或不會過期的工作階段 cookie 中。The method stores the session identifier in either the URL (when cookieless session state is used) or in a non-expiring session cookie. 根據預設，置於不會過期的工作階段 cookie 中的唯一工作階段識別碼，並設定`cookieAdded`參數來`true`。By default, the places a unique session identifier into a non-expiring session cookie and sets the `cookieAdded` parameter to `true`. 針對無 cookie 工作階段狀態，物件的唯一工作階段識別碼插入目前的 URL，瀏覽器重新導向至新的 URL，包括工作階段識別項，然後設定`redirected`參數來`true`。For a cookieless session state, the object inserts a unique session identifier into the current URL, redirects the browser to the new URL that includes the session identifier, and then sets the `redirected` parameter to `true`.

span.span: The response has already been sent.
-or-

exception.span: 傳遞給這個方法的工作階段 ID 未通過驗證。

span.span: The session ID passed to this method failed validation.

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

summary.span: 取得有效的工作階段識別項最大長度。

span.span: Gets the maximum length of a valid session identifier.

value.span: 有效的工作階段識別項最大長度。

span.span: The maximum length of a valid session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作階段識別項的最大長度為 80 個字元。The maximum length of a session identifier is 80 characters. 而所建立的工作階段識別碼方法是 24 個字元，工作階段識別碼所允許的最大長度類別為 80 個字元。While session identifiers created by the method are 24 characters long, the maximum length of a session identifier allowed by the class is 80 characters. 這點特別重要，如果您實作自訂。This is especially important if you implement a custom . 方法，以擷取從目前的工作階段識別項值，可確保，值不會超過值，而且工作階段識別項為 24 個字元字串，包含僅小寫字元z 和數字 0 到 5，藉由呼叫方法。The method, which retrieves session-identifier values from the current , ensures that values do not exceed the value and that the session identifier is a 24-character string containing only the lowercase characters a to z and the numbers 0 to 5 by calling the method. 如果您實作自訂繼承的類別類別並覆寫方法，但不是方法中，您的自訂工作階段識別碼值必須符合上述條件約束。If you implement a custom class that inherits the class and overrides the method but not the method, your custom session-identifier values must meet the constraints above. 如需範例，會覆寫類別，並實作這些方法，請參閱針對提供的範例方法。For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method.

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

returns.span: 如果工作階段識別項有效，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the session identifier is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法會驗證提供`id`是 24 個字元字串，其中包含從小寫字元 z 和數字 0 到 5 且最大長度的工作階段識別碼不會超過 80 個字元。The method verifies that the supplied `id` is a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5 and that the maximum length of the session ID does not exceed 80 characters. 方法呼叫時擷取 HTTP 要求，以確保提供的工作階段識別碼的格式是正確的工作階段識別項的方法。The method calls the method when retrieving a session identifier from an HTTP request, to ensure that the supplied session identifier is properly formatted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繼承的類別類別並覆寫並方法，提供並驗證方法做為。The following code example shows a class that inherits the class and overrides the and methods with methods that supply and validate a as the . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/GuidSessionIDModule.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/GuidSessionIDModule.vb#7)] 若要使用此範例所示的自訂類別，取代`SessionID`HTTP 模組在您的 Web.config 檔案，與您的自訂類別，如下列範例所示。To use the custom class demonstrated in this example, replace the `SessionID` HTTP module in your Web.config file with your custom class, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

para.span: 您可以提供自訂的工作階段識別碼使用的 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態，藉由建立繼承的類別類別並覆寫和與您自己的自訂實作的方法。

span.span: You can supply a custom session identifier to be used by ASP.NET session state by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementation.

para.span: 即使當您建立自訂工作階段識別項，工作階段識別碼會限制為 80 個字元的類別。

span.span: Even when you create a custom session identifier, the session ID is limited to 80 characters by the class.

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview
